import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Person } from '../person'; import { PersonLsService } from '../person-ls.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.css'], }) export class ListComponent implements OnInit { people: Person[] = []; constructor(private personLsService: PersonLsService) {} ngOnInit() { this.people = this.personLsService.getAll(); } }
